metadata.title: CVE-2016-4347 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: CVE-2015-7558. Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2015-7558.Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2015-7558 instead of thiscandidate.  All references and descriptions in this candidate have beenremoved to prevent accidental usage.

criterions.comment: librsvg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
